This study evaluate safety , tolerability efficacy anti-CD27 antibody varlilumab combination atezolizumab . During Phase , 37 patient enrol receive recommended Phase dose varlilumab combination atezolizumab 1200 mg. All patient enrol study closely monitor determine response treatment well side effect may occur .
